short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes FlipAnim by adding new sprites, new buttons, an all-new dashboard page, and so much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing FlipAnim Plus: an add-on that makes FlipAnim better. It adds a new fresh dark background that makes navigating so much easier, new buttons, and helpful stats that rates your analytics via grade.
